attributes.additional_details: I  put this request to the government after they had a little tif  with murdoch. the request is as follows: get rid of the sun newspaper and its sub newspapers, get rid of the times ltd, disband free right wing newspapers such as the metro and evening standard. to create a free press where there is no opinionanted newspapers that report about celebrity's lives; newspapers should be free from proprietoral influence and should have a duty to give us the news that matters in the world, this in turn could help the high number of naivety and ignorance within out country, this will make our country more politically motivated and in turn people will start to stand up for their freedoms.
